content: Let's play a math puzzle game! I have an item that costs $5.55 and I want to apply a sales tax of 7.5% to it. Can you calculate the total cost of the item after applying the sales tax? Remember to round to the nearest cent! To make it more challenging, can you write a program in Java that takes in the item cost and sales tax rate as input and outputs the total cost with the sales tax included? Good luck!
